name: Fortune Panda 2 - Fun Arcade
description:
SEQUEL OF FIVE STAR CASUAL GAME, KOOAPPS IS EXTREMELY EXCITED TO RELEASE - FORTUNE PANDA 2

One of the best pick up and play games for all ages. Collect coins and dodge obstacles in this insanely addicting game. Get notifications when your friends beat your high score to make sure you can win it back right away.

HOW TO PLAY:
---------------------------------
- Tilt your device to move left or right
- Tap the screen to jump
oh, and the screen loops around : )

Gold coins falling from the sky! Wait... there's a catch...

"There ain't no such thing as a free lunch, Fortune Panda" - Dark Panda Lord

Isn't money falling down from the sky such a dream? But even as gold coins fall from the sky, our friend Fortune Panda, realizes that he needs to run and dodge all the bombs, lobsters, frogs and even a truck! Trucks? What the...

CONTACT INFO:
---------------------------------
Questions or suggestions?
Email us at support@kooapps.com
